ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] getting new friends
ygData.msgSnippet: I was thinking about this the other day... and...rangers, warriors and paladins have a lot of button pushing too... Kick/Bash/Slam/Taunt as appropriate... Dont
ygData.messageBody:
I was thinking about this the other day...
and...rangers, warriors and paladins have a lot of
button pushing too... Kick/Bash/Slam/Taunt as
appropriate... Dont get me wrong. I hate all the
button pushing too, but I dont see how it is worse
than the other melee classes, and the upside is we
dont have to stare at a spell book.

Harmonie Moonsong
upon having just scribed the 30th composition
<Claw of Nagafen>
Bristlebane
> "Holy S#$@! You guys have to do that [push buttons]
all the
> time??? That's ridiculous."
